patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -3,16 +3,7 @@
   content: ["./src/**/*.{html,ts}" ],
   theme: {
     extend: {},
   },
-  plugins: [],
+  plugins: ['flowbite/plugin'],
 }
 
-/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */
-module.exports = {
-  content: ["./src/**/*.{html,ts}", // add this line],
-  theme: {
-    extend: {},
-  },
-  plugins: [],
-}
-

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,7 +1,11 @@
 /** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */
 module.exports = {
-  content: ["./src/**/*.{html,ts}" ],
+  content: [
+    "./src/**/*.{html,ts}"
+    'flowbite/plugin'
+
+],
   theme: {
     extend: {},
   },
   plugins: ['flowbite/plugin'],
